0.upgraded: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square.
0.pieces: Upgrade 1 of your common pieces. Gain an action.

1.upgraded: Do 1 standard move with one of your common pieces, or upgrade 1 of your common pieces.
1.pieces: Place 2 common pieces of your color on empty squares.

2.upgraded: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square, or upgrade 1 of your common pieces.
2.pieces: You may do 1 combat leap with one of your common pieces.

3.pieces: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square.

4.upgraded: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square.
4.pieces: You may do 1 combat move or 2 standard moves, using your non-legendary pieces.

5.upgraded: Place 1 heroic piece of your color on any empty square.
5.pieces: You may do 1 standard move and 1 combat move (in either order), using your common pieces.

6.upgraded: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square.
6.pieces: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square, or convert 1 common enemy piece to your color.

7.upgraded: You may do up to 3 standard moves, using your common pieces.
